description.name: CentralNic Reseller
description.tagline: The trusted worldwide solution for your domain reselling needs.
description.long:
## Apply for an account
CentralNic Reseller & WHMCS work seamlessly to offer you and your customers a hassle-free experience while registering and managing domain names.
[Click here to create an account](https://www.centralnicreseller.com/en/sign-up-whmcs)
features: 1,100+ Tlds to Resell to Your Customer Base
Trusted by Large Global Web Hosts for Their Domain Reselling Needs
20+ Years of Experience in the Domain Industry
